bugs.title: Player character falls through floor in level 3
bugs.description: When jumping near the bridge at coordinates (245, 120, 78), character clips through terrain mesh. Issue occurs consistently with jump height over 2.5 units.
bugs.reproductionSteps:
1. Go to Level 3
2. Navigate to the bridge area (coordinates 245,120)
3. Jump with maximum jump height
4. Character falls through floor

comments.author: Sarah Chen
comments.text: Looking into this now. Seems to be related to the collision detection system. The navmesh might be misaligned.

comments.author: Alex Rivera
comments.text: I can reproduce this consistently. Happens every time at coordinates (245, 120). Video attached in the ticket.

bugs.title: Audio cutting out during boss fight
bugs.description: Music stops playing randomly during final boss encounter when multiple sound effects trigger simultaneously. Audio engine seems to overload.
bugs.reproductionSteps:
1. Reach final boss
2. Trigger at least 3 sound effects within 1 second
3. Background music cuts out

bugs.title: UI overlaps on 4K resolution
bugs.description: Menu buttons overlap with inventory panel at 3840x2160 resolution. Text becomes unreadable and buttons are misaligned.
bugs.reproductionSteps:
1. Set resolution to 3840x2160
2. Open inventory menu
3. Navigate to character stats

bugs.title: Save file corruption on quick save
bugs.description: Using quick save feature sometimes corrupts the save file. File becomes unreadable after approximately 5-7 quick saves.
bugs.reproductionSteps:
1. Enable quick save
2. Use quick save 5-7 times
3. Attempt to load any quick save

bugs.title: Performance drops in crowded areas
bugs.description: FPS drops below 30 when more than 20 NPCs on screen. GPU usage spikes to 100%. Need to optimize NPC rendering.
bugs.reproductionSteps:
1. Go to market district
2. Wait for crowd to gather
3. Observe FPS drop
bugs.resolution: Implemented LOD system for NPCs, reduced draw calls by 40%

bugs.title: Controller vibration stops working
bugs.description: Controller vibration feature stops working after approximately 20 minutes of gameplay. Requires game restart to fix.
bugs.reproductionSteps:
1. Play game for 20+ minutes
2. Notice vibration stops
3. Restart game to restore

bugs.title: Multiplayer connection timeout
bugs.description: Players experience connection timeout when joining multiplayer sessions with more than 8 players. Network handshake fails.
bugs.reproductionSteps:
1. Create lobby with 8+ players
2. Attempt to start match
3. Connection timeout occurs

bugs.title: Texture loading pop-in
bugs.description: High-resolution textures pop in noticeably during camera movement. Most prominent in open world areas.
bugs.reproductionSteps:
1. Sprint through open world
2. Observe texture pop-in
3. More noticeable with fast camera movement
